title: 5 reasons to come to the ODI Summit 2015

details.description: This year our theme is Generation Open: innovators and entrepreneurs, customers and citizens, students and parents who embrace network thinking. See our five reasons why you should join us.
details.content:
The ODI Summit is back again this year at London's BFI Southbank, with keynotes, open data stories, challenges, data-driven art and music workshops and more

The ODI Summit 2015 celebrates Generation Open: innovators and entrepreneurs, customers and citizens, students and parents who embrace network thinking.

Here are five reasons why you should join us on 3 November

1. We’re bigger and better than ever

For our 2015 ODI Summit we’ll be returning to BFI Southbank and this year we’ll be filling the entire venue with exciting talks and activities, from keynote talks and story theatres to art instillations. You can also polish your data skills the day before at our Training Discovery Day hosted by Arup.

2. You'll hear from world-class speakers

From entrepreneurs and Chief Technology Officers to researchers and artists, our speakers are open data luminaries and leading pioneers of open innovation.

3. You'll find your place in Generation Open

Our diverse agenda will immerse you in the world of open data. You will explore and share ideas and impacts as part of Generation Open – innovators and entrepreneurs, customers and citizens, students and parents who embrace network thinking.

4. You'll meet inspiring people from around the world

We will be welcoming up to 600 attendees from around the world. Meet international leaders, entrepreneurs and innovators in our audience and learn about open data from a global perspective.

5. You will leave buzzing with new ideas

Whether you come alone or with your whole team, your experience at the ODI Summit will leave you re-energised with new ideas and approaches to your work. You'll hear inspiring stories and cutting-edge ideas and have countless opportunities to learn, share and teach.


Find out more about our speakers, schedule, story theatres and pre-summit Training Discovery Day all on the ODI Summit website.

Register now and join us on 3 November, 2015.
